1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Image Critical Strikes empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time one of your Images Critically Strikes a Hero, gain 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20.Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, gain an additional 20 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.longDescription: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Attacks from Stealth empower Wind Walk
1.longDescription: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 24.8%.Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, the duration before Wind Walk can be broken by damage is increased to 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Spell Block
4.longDescription: Mirror Image grants you and your Images 2 charges of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy Ability against you by 50%. Can hold up to 2 charges.

4.name: One With The Wind
4.description: Take less damage while Wind Walking
4.longDescription: Take less damage while Wind Walking

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes reduces incoming attacks
4.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, you take 25% reduced damage from Hero Basic Attacks.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of your Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of your Basic Attack damage for each Image you have active.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.longDescription: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Become an unstoppable whirlwind of death
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 110 seconds. Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Images can be controlled
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 6 seconds. Switch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 20% of your damage.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Attacks reduce Mirror Image cooldown
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates an Image
13.longDescription: Wind Walk creates an Image at your location that will continue whatever you were doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports you
13.longDescription: Wind Walk teleports you a short distance in the direction you're currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Always Critically Strike disabled targets
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attack from Wind Walk to increase damage
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from you and your Images for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: Advancing Strikes increases Attack Speed
16.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase your Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

20.name: Dance Of Death
20.description: Images use Bladestorm
20.longDescription: Images use Bladestorm

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Images have increased Health and Duration
20.longDescription: Your Images gain an additional 50% of your Health, and last up to 32 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Greatly reduce Wind Walk cooldown
20.longDescription: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Increase Advancing Strikes effect and duration
20.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Advancing Strikes
abilities.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 30% of your damage and have 50% of your current Health. Images last up to 16 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: You and your Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 7.94 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 30% and you can pass through other units.Damage taken within the first 1 second will not break Wind Walk.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 20% of your damage.

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.longDescription: Increase the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%.

1.name: Resistant
1.description: Stuns and Roots reduce damage taken while in Siege Mode
1.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, the duration of Silences, Stuns, Slows, and Roots are reduced by 75%.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Stealth and extra damage in Siege Mode
1.longDescription: Stealth when entering Siege Mode. Your next Basic Attack from Siege Mode will deal 100% more damage. Lose Stealth when Basic Attacking, using an Ability, taking damage, or returning to Tank Mode.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Vigorous Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks heal you
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
4.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 75% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Excessive Force
4.description: Double the knock back distance
4.longDescription: Double the knock back distance.

7.name: Mine Field
7.longDescription: Increase the number of mines by 2.

7.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Thrusters by 10 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar.

7.name: First Aid
7.longDescription: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a large bullet across the map
10.longDescription: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 365 damage to enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Fire damaging napalm at enemies
10.longDescription: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: First Strike
13.description: Basic Attacks do extra damage if not attacked
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if you haven't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bullhead Mines
13.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks back
13.longDescription: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

13.name: Barricade
13.description: Concussive Blast creates a wall
13.longDescription: Create a wall of path blocking debris for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

16.name: Hover Siege Mode
16.description: Move slowly in Siege Mode
16.longDescription: You can move at 50% Movement Speed in Siege Mode.

16.name: Graduating Range
16.description: Gradually increase range in Siege Mode
16.longDescription: While in Siege Mode your standard Basic Attack range increases by 20% every 3 seconds, up to 100%.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain a Shield
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: BFG repeatedly travels through the map
20.longDescription: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Increased range and impact damage
20.longDescription: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Basic Attacks chain to enemy Minions and Mercs
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed and Range
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

abilities.name: Artillery
abilities.description: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage to distant enemies.

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that deal 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deals 309 (147 + 4% per level) damage and pushes enemies away.

abilities.name: Siege Mode
abilities.description: Become immobile to increase Basic Attack range by 90%, deal 25% splash damage, and deal 30% bonus damage to Minions and Structures.

abilities.name: Napalm Strike
abilities.description: Deals 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
abilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 800 (380 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path.

1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
1.longDescription: Reduces Innervate's cooldown by 10 seconds.

1.name: Moonburn
1.description: Increases Moonfire damage to non-Heroic units
1.longDescription: Increases Moonfire's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Reveals a large area, can be killed
1.longDescription: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Places a Scouting Drone at target location, revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Elune's Grace
4.description: Increases Basic Ability ranges
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 30%.

4.name: Versatile
4.description: Increases Innervate Mana return
4.longDescription: Increases the Mana return of Innervate to 25%.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant that does 141 (67 + 4% per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.

7.name: Strangling Vines
7.longDescription: Entangling Roots deals 100% more damage.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to heal and rearm Structures
7.longDescription: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heals nearby allied Heroes over time
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Heals 176 (84 + 4% per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: Silence and damage nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 90 seconds. After a short delay, deal 820 (389 + 4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Also passively increases your Mana Regeneration by 1.5.

13.name: Life Seed
13.description: Nearby Heroes receive Regrowth periodically
13.longDescription: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

13.name: Full Moonfire
13.description: Increases Moonfire area and reduces Mana cost
13.longDescription: Increases Moonfire's radius by 60% and reduces its Mana cost by 50%.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage
13.longDescription: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to become Invulnerable
13.longDescription: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Hardened Focus
16.description: Faster cooldowns near full Health
16.longDescription: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

16.name: Tenacious Roots
16.description: Increases Entangling Root area and duration
16.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.5 seconds longer.

16.name: Hindering Moonfire
16.description: Moonfire slows targets
16.longDescription: Moonfire slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Lunar Shower
16.description: Successive Moonfires are more powerful
16.longDescription: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of your next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Increases Tranquility healing and grants Mana
20.longDescription: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

20.name: Nightmare
20.description: Increases Twilight Dream silence duration and adds slow
20.longDescription: Increases Twilight Dream's silence duration to 4 seconds and it also slows enemies by 50%.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Innervate
abilities.description: Grant allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 329 (156 + 4% per level) Health instantly and an additional 1102 (523 + 4% per level) Health over 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 231 (110 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds, and deals 257 (122 + 4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Heals 176 (84 + 4% per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Twilight Dream
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 820 (389 + 4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Also passively increases your Mana Regeneration by 1.5.

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.longDescription: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10.15% of her maximum Health.

1.name: Sharpened Blades
1.longDescription: Impaling Blades deals 25% more damage.

1.name: Energizing Grasp
1.longDescription: Primal Grasp refunds 10 Mana for each enemy hit, up to 60.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Clean Kill
4.description: Ravage refunds Mana on kill and increases damage
4.longDescription: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of your next Ravage by 25%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Damage nearby enemies
4.longDescription: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 88 (42 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Fury of the Swarm
4.description: Basic Attacks cleave
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around Kerrigan.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to deal damage over time
4.longDescription: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Adaptation
7.longDescription: After 5 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

7.name: Blade Torrent
7.longDescription: Increases Impaling Blades' radius by 30%.

7.name: Assimilation Mastery
7.description: Assimilation lasts longer and increases Health and Mana regeneration
7.longDescription: Increases the duration of Assimilation by 100%. While Assimilation Shields are active your Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Persistently damage nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Deals 82 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: Summon an Ultralisk to chase a target
10.longDescription: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 91 damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

13.name: Eviscerate
13.description: Increases Ravage range
13.longDescription: Increases Ravage's range by 40%.

13.name: Double Strike
13.description: Abilities empower Basic Attacks
13.longDescription: When your Basic Abilities damage an enemy, your next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

13.name: Queen's Rush
13.description: Takedowns increase Move Speed
13.longDescription: Activate to increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

16.name: Aggressive Defense
16.description: Increases Assimilation Shields gained
16.longDescription: Increases base Shield amount gained from Assimilation by 100%.

16.name: Essence for Essence
16.description: Activate to steal Health from your target
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

16.name: Overdrive
16.description: Activate to empower your Abilities for extra Mana
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Increased Maelstrom size and Shield generation
20.longDescription: Maelstrom size increased by 25% . Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: Ultralisk spawns a new Ultralisk on death
20.longDescription: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 8 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Assimilation
abilities.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.Current maximum: 2200 (1045 + 4% per level)

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage. If this kills the target, its cooldown is instantly reset.

abilities.name: Impaling Blades
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

abilities.name: Primal Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
abilities.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.description: Deals 180 (86 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

1.name: Invigoration
1.description: Reduces Hamstring Mana cost and cooldown on Heroes
1.longDescription: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Chop Meat
1.longDescription: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.

1.name: Abattoir
1.description: Lose less Meat on death and grants additional Attack Damage
1.longDescription: Decreases the amount of Fresh Meat lost on death from 10 to 5. Once you complete the Fresh Meat quest, Heroes continue to drop Meat that grants Attack Damage. This bonus Meat is not lost on death.

4.name: Flail Axe
4.description: Increases Hamstring length
4.longDescription: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
4.description: Reduces Ruthless Onslaught cooldown on impact
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 40% upon impact.

4.name: Cheap Shot
4.description: Hamstring does bonus damage to movement-impaired targets
4.longDescription: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.

7.name: Insatiable Blade
7.description: Increases Butcher's Brand healing and adds Movement Speed
7.longDescription: Increases Butcher's Brand's healing from 75% to 100% of your Basic Attack damage. While facing the branded enemy, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

7.name: Victuals
7.longDescription: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, you regain 4% of your maximum Health.

7.name: Meat Shield
7.description: Ruthless Onslaught reduces Ability Damage taken
7.longDescription: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, you take 50% reduced Ability Damage for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Furnace Blast
10.description: Deal damage around you after a delay
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 60 seconds. After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
10.description: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
10.longDescription: Cooldown: 80 seconds. Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

13.name: Cleaver
13.description: Basic Attacks deal area damage
13.longDescription: Basic Attack deal 35% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

13.name: Savage Charge
13.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals extra damage
13.longDescription: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Brutal Strike
13.description: Hamstring empowers Basic Attacks
13.longDescription: After using Hamstring, your next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

16.name: Crippling Slam
16.description: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
16.longDescription: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 25%.

16.name: Enraged
16.description: Gain Attack Speed and reduce damage taken at low Health
16.longDescription: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Receiving damage that reduces you below 50% of your maximum Health causes you to become Enraged for 10 seconds. While Enraged, you gain 40% Attack Speed and become Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Blood Frenzy
16.description: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Attack and Movement Speed by 5% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Fires of Hell
20.description: Furnace Blast explodes twice
20.longDescription: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

20.name: Slaughterhouse
20.description: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
20.longDescription: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Quest: Nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and Heroes drop 5 Fresh Meat when they die. You can pick up Fresh Meat to gain 1 Basic Attack damage per Meat. Can hold up to 125 Meat. You drop up to 10 Fresh Meat upon dying. Reward: After acquiring 125 pieces of Fresh Meat, gain and additional 100 Basic Attack damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. You also no longer lose Fresh Meat on death.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 49.92% fading over 2 seconds.  Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Last 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

1.name: Grizzled Bear
1.longDescription: Misha periodically reduces the damage received from Hero Basic Attacks by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Hunter-Gatherer
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Globes, Rexxar gains 600 maximum Health.

1.name: Survivalist Training
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana.

1.name: Flare
1.longDescription: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 5 seconds.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her
4.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 3.9% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Crippling Talons
4.description: Increases Spirit Swoop slow amount and duration
4.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 40% and its duration to 3 seconds.

4.name: Taking Flight
4.description: Increases Spirit Swoop range, returns Mana
4.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded.

4.name: Easy Prey
4.description: Misha is more effective against Minions and Mercs
4.longDescription: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and reduces the damage Misha takes from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

7.longDescription: Increases Mend Pet's duration by 5 seconds.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower Misha, Charge! cooldown
7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Bird of Prey

7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 200% to non-Heroic enemies.

10.name: Bestial Wrath

10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

13.description: Misha deals damage to nearby enemies
13.longDescription: Misha deals 28 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Thrill of the Hunt
13.description: Basic Attacks increase Move Speed
13.longDescription: Your Basic Attacks increase both you and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

20.longDescription: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigum.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Adds Run and Gun charges and reduces Mana cost
20.longDescription: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 430 (204 + 4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 1414 (671 + 4% per level) damage to the target and 691 (328 + 4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 561 (267 + 4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Deep Chill
1.longDescription: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

1.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.54 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Pierces first target
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Damage to Chilled targets returns Mana
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and abilities return 25.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Chill attackers and reduce Basic Attacks
4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that attack you are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds you reduce damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 50%.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.longDescription: Doubles the width of Cone of Cold and causes each target hit to reduce its cooldown by 1 seconds, to a maximum of 5 seconds per cast.

7.name: Frostbitten
7.longDescription: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.longDescription: When Frostbolt hits a Chilled target its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and you regain 10 Mana.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: Creates a ring that damages and roots enemies
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summons Water Elemental to fight for you
10.longDescription: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increases cast range
13.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Ability damage dealt gives Jaina Shields
13.longDescription: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Reduces cooldowns and Mana costs
13.longDescription: Activate to make your Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: Increases radius
16.longDescription: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Increases enemy damage taken
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold are also afflicted with Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Roots Chilled targets
16.longDescription: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: Secondary frost explosion occurs
20.longDescription: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases cast range and Elemental mimics Basic Abilities
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Improved Ice Block
20.description: Gain Invulnerability and Chill enemies
20.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

20.name: Arcane Power
20.description: Increases Spell Damage and restores Mana
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Deal 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.description: Deal 504 (204 + 4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 680 (323 + 4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

abilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilities.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

1.name: Taste for Blood
1.description: Kills increase Globe of Annihilation damage
1.longDescription: Quest: Enemies that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation increase its damage by 2, up to 500.

1.name: Sieging Wrath
1.description: Hitting Heroes empowers Globe of Annihilation
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Golbe of Annihilation hits an Hero, its damage is increased by 4 up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

1.name: Master of Destruction
1.description: Reduces All Shall Burn Mana cost and increased Range
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Each charge level also increases the range by 10%.

4.name: Gluttony
4.description: Damage heals Azmodan
4.longDescription: All Shall Burn heals you for 20% of the damage dealt.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Increases Demon Warrior damage, decreases Mana cost
4.longDescription: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Nearby Mercs are stronger and you take less damage from them
4.longDescription: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

4.name: Sin's Grasp
4.description: Activate to deal damage over time
4.longDescription: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 543 (258 + 4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: Infernal Globe
7.description: Reduces cast time and increases missile speed
7.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

7.name: Bound Minion
7.description: General of Hell improves a Minion
7.longDescription: Using General of Hell on a Lane Minion decreases the non-Heroic damage they take by 75% and increases the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

7.name: Gluttonous Ward
7.description: Place a ward that restores your Health and Mana
7.longDescription: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of your maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds.

7.name: March of Sin
7.description: Can move during All Shall Burn
7.longDescription: Azmodan can move at 75% speed while channeling All Shall Burn.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
10.longDescription: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 60 (29 + 4% per level) damage and have 800 (380 + 4% per level) health. Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

10.name: Black Pool
10.description: Create an empowering zone
10.longDescription: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

13.name: Hellforged Armor
13.description: Demon Warriors burn enemies and take less damage
13.longDescription: Demon Warriors deal 10 damage to nearby enemies every second and take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

13.name: Hedonism
13.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation Mana cost
13.longDescription: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

13.name: Infused Power
13.description: All Shall Burn gains charge level
13.longDescription: All Shall Burn gains an additional charge level, increasing its maximum damage by 40%.

16.name: Battleborn
16.description: Globe of Annihilation summons a Demon Warrior
16.longDescription: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

16.name: Demonic Smite
16.description: Demon Lieutenants cast Demonic Smite
16.longDescription: Demon Lieutenants will periodically blast enemy Minions with demonic energy, dealing 411 damage.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

16.name: Sin for Sin
16.description: Activate to steal Health from your target
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

20.name: Perishing Flame
20.description: Demonic Grunts explode on death
20.longDescription: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 damage to nearby enemies.

20.name: Fifth Circle
20.description: Black Pool gives slowing attacks
20.longDescription: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Forced Recruitment
20.description: Reduces General of Hell cooldown, gains a charge
20.longDescription: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

abilities.name: General of Hell
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Summon. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Summons. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage on impact.  Long range.

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Mana: 16 per secondChannel a death beam on an enemy dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage per second.  Does 25% more damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Black Pool
abilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Invasion
abilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 60 (29 + 4% per level) damage and have 800 (380 + 4% per level) health.Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

1.name: Purge Evil
1.longDescription: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

1.name: Protection in Death
1.description: Upon death, grants nearby allies a Shield
1.longDescription: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

1.name: Even In Death
1.description: Can use Basic Abilities before exploding
1.longDescription: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Horadric Reforging
4.description: Reduces El'druin's Might cooldown when enemy is hit
4.longDescription: If El'druins Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

4.name: Swift Retribution
4.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed bonus and duration
4.longDescription: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: All healing effects increased
4.longDescription: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Vigorous Strike
4.description: Basic Attacks heal you
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Angel's Grace
7.description: El'druin's Might teleport grants Movement Speed
7.longDescription: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.longDescription: When your shield expires, it explodes for 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Zealotry
7.description: Increases Righteousness' duration and reduces cooldown
7.longDescription: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.longDescription: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: Charge and stun an enemy Hero
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: Create zone of Invulnerable
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deals damage to nearby enemies
13.longDescription: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Angelic Absorption
13.description: Grants Health Regeneration when attacked
13.longDescription: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 138 Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Imposing Will
13.description: Slows enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed
13.longDescription: Enemies that attack you while shielded have their Attack Speed and Movement Speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Angelic Might
13.description: Increased Basic Attack damage
13.longDescription: Gain 25% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each target hit by Smite.

16.name: Blade of Justice
16.description: El'druin's Might teleport increases Attack Speed
16.longDescription: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Ground
16.description: Teleporting using El'Druin's Might makes a blocking field
16.longDescription: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'Druin's Might.

16.name: Salvation
16.description: Stronger Shield per nearby allied Hero
16.longDescription: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 35%.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to steal Health from your target
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Judgment has increased range, reduced cooldown
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Sanctification increased duration, adds damage bonus
20.longDescription: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain a Shield
20.longDescription: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 1206 (572 + 4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25%. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies by 25%.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields you for 702 (33 + 4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 281 (134 + 4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 316 (150 + 4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

1.name: Backlash
1.longDescription: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.longDescription: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 1249 (593 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, you evade all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

4.name: Death's Reach
4.description: Increases Spectral Scythe range
4.longDescription: Increases Spectral Scythe range by 20%.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns Skeletal Warriors
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors that fixate on the emeny for 15 seconds. These do not count towards your Raise Skeleton maximum.

4.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
4.description: Raise Skeleton restores Mana
4.longDescription: Gain 8 Mana when you raise a Skeletal Warrior.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes against Heroes heals you
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals you for 145 (69 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit.

7.name: Weaken
7.description: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow
7.longDescription: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow from 50% to 75%.

7.name: Rathma's Blessing
7.longDescription: Raising a Skeletal Warrior heals you for 145 (69 + 4% per level).

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: Poison enemies around you
10.longDescription: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 1249 (593 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Summon Frost Mages to damage and slow enemies
10.longDescription: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 103 (49 + 4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Decrepify
13.description: Spectral Scythe slows
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe slows enemies by 40% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Giant's Curse
13.description: Increases Cursed Strikes damage to Heroes
13.longDescription: Cursed Stike deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

13.name: Corpse Explosion
13.description: Skeletal Warriors explode on death
13.longDescription: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 143 (68 + 4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

16.name: Flowing Wounds
16.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe cooldown if Hero is hit
16.longDescription: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 4 seconds if you hit an enemy Hero.

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.description: Bone Prison causes Vulnerable
16.longDescription: Enemies rooted by Bone Prision become Vunerable for 2 seconds, taking 25% increased damage.

16.name: Skeleton Mastery
16.description: Increases maximum Skeletal Warriors and damage
16.longDescription: Increases the maximum Skeletal Warriors you can have to 6 and increases their damage by 100%.

20.name: Call of the Grave
20.description: Increases Poison Nova damage
20.longDescription: Poison Nova deals an additional 1% of the target's maximum life as damage every second.

20.name: Raised Mage
20.description: Raise Frost Mages from fallen Heroes and increases slow
20.longDescription: When a nearby enemy Hero dies, a Frost Mage appears from their corpse to fight for you. Also increases thge slow of Frost Mages from 30% to 50%.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Spectral Scythe reduces healing taken
20.longDescription: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Bone Spear
20.description: Damage enemies in a line
20.longDescription: Cooldown: 10 seconds. Deal 570 (271 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior that deals moderate damage and lasts up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of your maximum Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe
abilities.description: Summon a scythe at target location that travels toward you after a 1-second delay, damaging enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Once activated, your Basic Attacks over the next 4 seconds deal damage in a wide arc and reduce the Attack Speed of enemies hit by 50% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2-second delay, root target enemy in place for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal massive poison damage over 10 seconds to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Skeletal Mages
abilities.description: Summon 4 Skeletal Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts up to 15 seconds

1.longDescription: Using Basic Abilities reduces the next Basic Attack against you by 50%.  Maximum 2 stacks.

4.description: All healing effects increased

4.name: Roar
4.description: Increases Punish damage
4.longDescription: Increases Punish damage by 50%.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Condemn cooldown reduced per enemy hit
4.longDescription: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

4.name: Laws of Hope
4.description: Increases Health Regen, activate to burst heal
4.longDescription: Regenerating 10 Health per second.Activate to heal 20% of your max Health over 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Momentum
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Conviction
7.longDescription: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: The Crusade Marches On
7.description: Abilities reduce the cooldown of Iron Skin
7.longDescription: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Sins Exposed

7.longDescription: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 68 extra damage and the mark is removed.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Jump to area damaging and knocking up enemies

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Bouncing shield that stuns
10.longDescription: Deal 114 damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deals damage to nearby enemies
13.longDescription: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Hold Your Ground

13.name: Subdue
13.description: Increases Punish slow and duration
13.longDescription: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

13.description: Activate to reduce incoming Ability Damage

16.name: Blessed Hammer
16.description: Condemn creates a spinning hammer
16.longDescription: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around you, dealing 41 damage to enemies it hits.

16.name: Fanaticism
16.description: Iron Skin causes damage taken to increase Movement Speed

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increases Blessed Shield stun duration and targets hit
20.longDescription: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Gain a Shield instead of dying
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, gain a Shield equal to your maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.description: Step forward dealing 248 (118 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Condemn

abilities.name: Falling Sword
abilities.description: You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds you land, dealing 800 (356 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

20.name: Haunt

20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second and feared enemies become Vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemy Movement Speed
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle that you can teleport to
20.longDescription: Cooldown: 1 seconds. Summon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle.

abilities.name: Life Tap
abilities.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% mana.

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 483 (209 + 4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 377 (179 + 4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 492 (214 + 4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

abilities.name: Horrify
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

1.name: Give Me More!

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage.Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Reveals a large area, can be killed
1.longDescription: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Places a Scouting Drone at target location, revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Vigorous Assault

4.name: Confident Aim
4.description: Reduces Penetrating Round cooldown when hitting a Hero

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Double-Barreled
13.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge
13.longDescription: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

13.description: Inspire lasts longer and activates with Adrenaline Rush

16.name: Executioner

16.name: Cluster Round
16.description: Penetrating Round does more damage per target hit and has increased width

16.name: Bullseye
16.description: First enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned

20.name: Dusk Wings
20.description: Banshees stay cloaked and attack more frequently

20.name: Bolt of the Storm

abilities.name: Advanced Optics

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 526 (250 + 4% per level) damage and knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for 965 (458 + 4% per level) when you are below 30% Health.

abilities.name: Hyperion
abilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 1740 (826 + 4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Raynor's Raiders
abilities.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 95 (45 + 4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

16.longDescription: Using Basic Abilities increases Ability Power

Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision of. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-cliking near it. While insde a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.

abilities.name: Tailwind

abilities.name: Fury

abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 208 (190 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Poly Bomb
abilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Ley Line Seal
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.
